attributes.additional_details: The act of religious slaughter is barbaric and needs to be banned. Cattle in particular can live for a significant amount of time after having their throats cut due to the way the brain receives blood, but all animals should be humanely slaughtered with absolutely no exceptions for religious reasons.
attributes.background: Ban the barbaric practice of religious animal slaughter

rejection.details:
This appears substantially to be a duplicate of a petition we already have open:

Ban the non-stun slaughter of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708

You may wish to sign this petition instead.
